builderSetPropertyDef.description: Enables the generation of change event mechanism
builderSetPropertyDef.name: generateChangeListener

builderSetPropertyDef.description: Enables the generation of java 5 enumeration types
builderSetPropertyDef.name: useJavaEnumTypes

builderSetPropertyDef.description: Enables the generation of java 5 generices for collections
builderSetPropertyDef.name: useTypesafeCollections

builderSetPropertyDef.description: Enables the generation of a delta determining mechnism for model objects
builderSetPropertyDef.name: generateDeltaSupport

builderSetPropertyDef.description: Enables the generation of a model copy mechanism
builderSetPropertyDef.name: generateCopySupport

builderSetPropertyDef.description: Enables the generation of logging code
builderSetPropertyDef.name: generateLoggingStatements

builderSetPropertyDef.description: Enables the generation of visitor code
builderSetPropertyDef.name: generateVisitorSupport
